posts.title: The Future of Web Development
posts.body: Web Development is evolving rapidly with new frameworks and tools emerging every day. Staying up to date is crucial for modern developers.
posts.author: Mike Chen

posts.title: Why Flutter Is Gaining Popularity
posts.body: Flutter allows developers to build cross-platform applications with a single codebase, saving time and resources.
posts.author: Sarah Johnson

posts.title: Clean Architecture in Mobile Apps
posts.body: Clean architecture helps in building scalable, testable, and maintainable applications by separating concerns.
posts.author: Ahmed Hassan

comments.comment: The pace of change can be overwhelming sometimes!
Great insights, staying updated is definitely key.
Flutter really changed the way I build apps.
Hot reload alone makes it worth learning.
Clean architecture saved my project more than once.
This should be a must-read for junior developers.
